description: Enable your AI assistant to generate stunning images and perform various actions using Midjourney's capabilities. Interact seamlessly with the MCP to create, modify, and check prompts for your creative projects.

apiKey.description: Go to InstantMcp.com and create an account. Then go to the API Keys page and create an API Key.

logLevel.description: Log level for the server (e.g., debug, info, warn, error).

tools.name: midjourney_imagine
tools.description: Generate up to 4 images from a text prompt using Midjourney's image generation capabilities.

mode.description: The task mode for generating images. Default is 'fast' if not specified.

prompt.description: Text prompt to generate the image from. Example: 'a cat --ar 1:1'

hookUrl.description: URL for task completion or failure notification. If not set, you'll need to request the result separately.

timeout.description: Queue timeout in seconds (300-1200). Default is 300 seconds for 'fast' and 'turbo' modes, 600 seconds for 'relax' mode.

getUrImages.description: Whether to obtain four small pictures. Default is false.

tools.name: midjourney_action
tools.description: Perform operations like upsampling, variations, zoom out, etc. on Midjourney-generated images.

jobId.description: The jobId returned in a previous Midjourney request

action.description: The action to perform on the image. Each corresponds to a Midjourney button operation.

hookUrl.description: URL for task completion or failure notification. If not set, you'll need to request the result separately.

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 300 seconds.

getUrImages.description: Whether to obtain four small pictures. Default is false.

tools.name: midjourney_seed
tools.description: Get the seed value from a Midjourney-generated image, which can be used for reproducibility.

jobId.description: The jobId returned in a previous Midjourney request

hookUrl.description: URL for task completion or failure notification. If not set, you'll need to request the result separately.

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 300 seconds.

tools.name: midjourney_blend
tools.description: Upload 2-5 images and combine them into a new image based on the concept and aesthetic of each image.

mode.description: The task mode for generating images. Default is 'fast' if not specified.

hookUrl.description: URL for task completion or failure notification. If not set, you'll need to request the result separately.

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 300 seconds.

dimensions.description: Scale of generated image. PORTRAIT (2:3), SQUARE (1:1), or LANDSCAPE (3:2). Default is SQUARE.

imgBase64Array.description: Array of base64-encoded images (2-5 images required). Each string should include the data URL prefix (e.g., 'data:image/png;base64,xxx').

tools.name: midjourney_describe
tools.description: Upload an image and generate four prompts based on the image.

hookUrl.description: URL for task completion or failed notification. If not set, you'll need to request the result separately.

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 300 seconds.

tools.name: midjourney_inpaint
tools.description: Modify specific regions of an image using a mask and optional prompt.

mask.description: Base64 encoded mask image where white areas indicate regions to be redrawn and black areas remain unchanged

jobId.description: The jobId of a previous Midjourney request to be modified

prompt.description: Optional drawing prompt for the selected areas

hookUrl.description: URL for task completion or failed notification. If not set, you'll need to request the result separately.

timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 300 seconds.

tools.name: midjourney_fetch_job
tools.description: Fetches the result status and details of a previously submitted Midjourney job using its Job ID.

jobId.description: The unique identifier of the Midjourney job to fetch the results for.

tools.name: midjourney_prompt_check
tools.description: Checks if a given text prompt is compliant with Midjourney rules before potentially using it for generation. This is a free check.

prompt.description: The text prompt to check for compliance.
